item.title: Bar Plot
item.description: Lets make a bar plot to show the number of home runs hit by each team in the 1980 season. library(Lahman) ## Warning: package 'Lahman' was built under R version 3.4.2 library(sqldf) ## Warning: package 'sqldf' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Warning: package 'gsubfn' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: proto ## Warning: package 'proto' was built under R version 3.

item.title: Histogram
item.description: Lets use a histogram to look at the weight distribution of professional baseball players. library(Lahman) ## Warning: package 'Lahman' was built under R version 3.4.2 library(sqldf) ## Warning: package 'sqldf' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Warning: package 'gsubfn' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: proto ## Warning: package 'proto' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: RSQLite library(ggplot2) ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.

item.title: Scatterplot
item.description: Lets compare players strikout totals to their strikeout totals by using a scatterplot. library(Lahman) ## Warning: package 'Lahman' was built under R version 3.4.2 library(sqldf) ## Warning: package 'sqldf' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Warning: package 'gsubfn' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: proto ## Warning: package 'proto' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: RSQLite library(ggplot2) ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.

item.title: Time Series
item.description: We can use a time series plot to view data over time. Lets use a time series plot to look at Babe Ruth’s home run totals for each season he played. library(Lahman) ## Warning: package 'Lahman' was built under R version 3.4.2 library(sqldf) ## Warning: package 'sqldf' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Warning: package 'gsubfn' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: proto ## Warning: package 'proto' was built under R version 3.
